headline: Is IBM’s AI and Hybrid Cloud Momentum Already Reflected in the 2025 Share Price?
summary: If you are wondering whether International Business Machines is still a smart buy after its big run, you are not alone. This article is going to unpack what the current share price really implies about its value. Despite a modest pullback of 2.7% over the last week, the stock is still up 1.2% over 30 days and a striking 36.8% year to date, with a 38.2% gain over the past year and triple digit returns over 3 and 5 years that have clearly reset expectations. Recently, IBM has stayed in the...
